author: straitstimes.com
title: Robbers kill nine police officers in southern Pakistan, say police | The Straits Times
text:
LAHORE, Pakistan - Robbers armed with guns and rocket-propelled grenades ambushed a police convoy in Pakistan on Aug 22, killing at least nine officers and wounding others, the police and interior ministry said.
The incident took place in the southern Pakistani district of Rahim Yar Khan.
A police statement said the robbers attacked two police patrols near the border between two provinces.
Pakistan's interior ministry and Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif condemned the attack and ordered police leadership to take swift action to chase and arrest the culprits.
The interior ministry put the death toll at 11. Police said they could confirm nine dead and they were waiting for more details.
The border region is considered a no-go area for citizens. Police and other law enforcement agencies do not have much control of the area, which a large number of gangs use as a safe haven. REUTERS
More On This Topic Two men killed in Johor Bahru suburb shoot-out with Malaysian police Man who allegedly killed 2 cops in Johor lived in closed-off commune Join ST's Telegram channel and get the latest breaking news delivered to you.

author: AB Newswire
title: Leading Online Business Consultant Lindsey Anderson to Be Featured on Netflix‚Äôs The Trust | Markets | bigspringherald.com
text:
20+ Year Business and Marketing Expert Makes Her High-Stakes Reality TV Debut PORTLAND, OR - In the last 20 years, Lindsey Anderson, leading online business consultant, has become one of the most influential voices in the digital marketing space. To date, her work has been showcased in several major media publications such as Fox, NBC, CBS, Huffington Post, ABC, and others.
A business scaling expert, Lindsey offers multiple programs‚Äîincluding the Content That Converts 90-Day Transformation Program and the 1:1 Mastery Program‚Äîthat help coaches, consultants and experts generate more high-quality leads and convert them into paying clients. She is also the driving force behind the Build and Monetize (BAM) Agency. Her agency goes beyond conventional advertising services, offering a comprehensive approach to elevate marketing and sales efforts.
The BAM Agency doesn't just stop at running paid advertising campaigns; they actively support product launches and put their client‚Äôs entire marketing and sales strategy into overdrive. Their expertise extends beyond tactical aspects, encompassing years of business strategy, market positioning, and brain-based learning design.
Author of the best-selling book, The Click Technique , and host of The Millionaire Maker Show podcast, Lindsey has developed several online marketing strategies that have been instrumental in helping entrepreneurs scale their online businesses. Now, she will be putting her business acumen to the test when she appears on Netflix‚Äôs highly anticipated reality TV series, The Trust: A Game of Greed .
The upcoming show‚Äôs premise revolves around a group of 11 strangers who are competing to win the grand prize‚Äîa quarter of a million dollars. The catch? The contestants are awardedthe prize money at the beginning of the show in the form of a trust. The money belongs to them, and if they survive the entire season, each contestant will be able to claim an even share.
Unlike the average game show, the contestants‚Äô fates are entirely dependent on each other, facing the dilemma of sharing the prize equally or strategically voting each other out. With the power to eliminate a contestant with just one vote, Lindsey and her peers grapple with the decision between relationships and money. The Trust is a riveting social experiment filled with drama, featuring betrayal, deception, paranoia, and greed as contestants fight to keep the big prize. The show challenges the conventional timeline of trust development, exploring whether trust can emerge among strangers when money is on the line.
To catch the first episode of The Trust: A Game of Greed when it airs on Netflix on January 10, 2024, click here. To learn more about Lindsey and her business coaching services, visit her website today.

author: SOLE Fitness
title: Upgraded SOLE F65 Treadmill Comes With Backlit LCD Display & 15 Incline Levels
text: Leading fitness manufacturer SOLE Fitness offers their enhanced SOLE F65, a heavy-duty treadmill that builds on the success of the popular F63 model. It's new and improved but still affordable. (firmenpresse) - By this time of the year, many of us are struggling to hold on to those New Year's resolutions we made just a few months ago. We wanted to look better, feel better, be better. And so, with the best of intentions, we set a goal to work out more. But then, somehow, March arrived and our resolutions flew out the window. But it's not too late to recommit, especially with the latest treadmill update from SOLE Fitness! Check out the upgraded SOLE F65 treadmill at https://www.soletreadmills.com/products/sole-f65 The F65 is the latest addition to SOLE‚Äôs line of premiere treadmills. Engineered with a user-friendly console and spacious running surface, the SOLE F65 offers enhanced features to improve performance while maintaining affordability. Customize Your Workout Upon purchasing the SOLE F65, you'll get access to the SOLE+ app with over 3,000 pre-recorded workouts for all skill levels. The workouts range from 10 to 60 minutes to accommodate any routine. And the best part? It's totally free! The app also uses various metrics such as heart rate to help you customize your workout experience. On the F65, you can reach speeds of up to 12 mph and select from a range of 15 incline levels. The customization possibilities are endless; you'll reach your fitness goals in record time. Additional Features The SOLE F65 also features cooling fans and an integrated tablet holder, so you can connect to your favorite workout routines or entertainment while exercising. With a USB port for charging devices and Bluetooth speakers for streaming music, the SOLE F65‚Äôs technology integration is truly seamless. Further, its 9-inch backlit LCD display showcases metrics such as speed, incline, time, distance traveled, calories, pulse, and pace. You can also toggle to a peak and valley graph to display and track important workout data. Shipping & Warranties The SOLE F65 ships free and is backed by a lifetime warranty for its frame and motor, along with a 2-year warranty for its deck and various components. You can keep your New Year's resolution this year and for years to come! Fitness Equipment With Exceptional Quality SOLE Fitness has been a leading manufacturer of quality fitness equipment for decades. Recognized with various awards such as Best Overall Treadmill and Best Customer Service, the company is expanding its presence globally. Their engineering and design team considers both customer feedback and the current fitness market when building fitness equipment that is both efficient and affordable. A satisfied customer said, ‚ÄúThis is a great treadmill. I've owned this for approximately one year. It is a quality product. I have a Sole elliptical E95 and decided on this brand due to the durability of the elliptical. I have this in my main living room; I like that it folds up in the event I need space. I use it 3-4 times a week. My husband is 6'2 and weighs 250 lbs. He also uses both machines. I definitely recommend.‚Äù Find out more at https://www.soletreadmills.com/products/sole-f65 Themen in dieser Pressemitteilung: Unternehmensinformation / Kurzprofil: SOLE Fitness SOLE Fitness https://www.soletreadmills.com/ info(at)soletreadmills.com 56 Exchange Pl. Salt Lake City United States Datum: 04.04.2024 - 23:00 Uhr Sprache: Deutsch News-ID 703213 Anzahl Zeichen: 3307 contact information: Contact person: Inquiries Town: Salt Lake City Kategorie: Typ of Press Release: Unternehmensinformation type of sending: Ver√∂ffentlichung Date of sending: 04/04/2024 Diese Pressemitteilung wurde bisher 12 mal aufgerufen. Die Pressemitteilung mit dem Titel: "Upgraded SOLE F65 Treadmill Comes With Backlit LCD Display & 15 Incline Levels" steht unter der journalistisch-redaktionellen Verantwortung von SOLE Fitness ( Nachricht senden ) Beachten Sie bitte die weiteren Informationen zum Haftungsauschlu√ü (gem√§√ü TMG - TeleMedianGesetz ) und dem Datenschutz (gem√§√ü der DSGVO ).

author: Chloe-Lee Longhetti
title: Pink and Carey Hart celebrate 18th wedding anniversary
text:
Singer Pink and husband Carey Hart are celebrating 18 years of marriage this year.
And to celebrate the anniversary milestone, motocross star Hart, 48, shared a sweet tribute to his pop star wife, 44, on Instagram .
"There is no one else on this planet I'd rather do it with than you," Hart wrote in his post about the life they've built together, which received 86,000 likes.
READ MORE: Ariana Grande announces comebackÔªø
Pink and husband Carey Hart are celebrating 18 years of marriage this year - and he has penned a tribute. (Instagram) READ MORE: Carlton star ties the knot in MelbourneÔªø
"In the last 18 years of marriage to this amazing human, we have done so much together," his post read.
"Raise two amazing children, travel the world, go on adventures, love, argue, make up, support each other, laugh, cry, laugh more, breakup, get back together, party, mourn, grow, and a million other things."
He added: "There is no one else on this planet I'd rather do it with than you. 22 years in each other lives and I'm looking forward to the next 22. As long as you don't kill me first ü§£ü§£ü§£ü§£. Love you baby Happy anniversary, @pink."Ôªø
READ MORE: Halle Bailey shocks with baby newsÔªø
"In the last 18 years of marriage to this amazing human, we have done so much together," his post read. (Instagram) In one image, the pair posed for a selfie, and in another black-and-white photo, they are seen staring out into the ocean while onboard a yacht.
The couple married in January 2006 in Costa Rica.
ÔªøThe pair met at the X-games in 2001, and Pink actually proposed to Hart in 2005 at one of his races with a pit board that read "Will you Marry Me?"
The couple married in January 2006 in Costa Rica. (Instagram) When he didn't immediately pull over, she pulled out a second sign for his next lap that read, "I'm serious!"
The couple announced their split in February, 2008, and Pink's iconic breakup song So What is actually about Hart.
The couple never confirmed why they broke up all those years ago.
Pink's iconic breakup song So What is actually about Hart. The pair are seen in the video clip. (YouTube) Eventually the couple reconciled, calling off their divorce in May 2009.
In an interview with ET Canada , Pink explained she had to work hard to make sure her newly-reconciled relationship didn't fly out the window after Hart heard the song.
"I didn't want him to know I was calling him a tool because I thought maybe he'd leave," she laughed.
"So I was like‚Ä¶ play line three, then skip to line five, definitely do not play line 10."

author: Metroland Staff
title: Newcastle man checks ticket on many phones, to confirm win
text: A Newcastle man is making travel plans after winning a Lotto 6-49 second prize. Robert Genosko plays the lottery weekly, and won $101,904.60 in the Aug. 28 draw. !‚Äî Windows 8.1 + IE11 and above ‚Äî> Robert Genosko won second-prize in a Lotto 6-49 ticket, winning $101,904.60 in August. A Newcastle man is making travel plans after winning a Lotto 6-49 second prize. Robert Genosko plays the lottery weekly, and won $101,904.60 in the Aug. 28 draw. Genosko uses OLG‚Äôs Quick Pick feature to make his selections and always adds Encore to his tickets. ‚ÄúI checked my ticket on the OLG app and was initially confused by what I saw,‚Äù Genosko said in a press release. ‚ÄúI checked my ticket on multiple phones to make sure what I was seeing was real. I was shocked and so happy.‚Äù Genosko first shared the news with his wife. ‚ÄúAt first, she thought I had won $101, but when she looked a little closer, she was pleasantly surprised. Winning is an incredible feeling. It‚Äôs both shocking and unbelievable, but it could happen to you.‚Äù He plans to help his family and travel. ‚ÄúI plan to enjoy every moment of life with my family,‚Äù he concluded. The winning ticket was purchased at [Esso on King Avenue East](https://www.google.com/maps?sca_esv=00b2415a928ac49a&sca_upv=1&rlz=1C5CHFA_enCA999CA999&output=search&q=Esso+on+King+Avenue+East&source=lnms&fbs=AEQNm0C5IIOpSDYVh51ut_zQFgH585hUmXBEfiyc3KZbf5BCLrdAeHw6QgI_YgMUsbX0iPItlukb7cOdhfcpIKoAlDR2K-Tpc-QEntO4DRtQHosQ09Im1z6G49EGekMFw3NUymhwKBXk1rDrB5TuPUCJofRVbnLoVWwN-L_Plj7tx1j42BhX8mEFzjPEkYiEhPcYk9nQ7R-xPwY0k648GI19OayHqzlFCQ&entry=mc&ved=1t:200715&ictx=111) in Newcastle Contact us at [thenewsroom@metroland.com](mailto:thenewsroom@metroland.com) To join the conversation set a first and last name in your user profile. author: aureliano
title: A lei foi feita para o bem do ser humano
text:
A lei foi feita para o bem do ser humano
9¬∫ Domingo do Tempo Comum [02 de junho de 2024]
[Mc 2,23 ‚Äì 3,6]
O relato do evangelho para esse domingo sugere dois pontos de reflex√£o: o repouso dominical e a transgress√£o da lei.
S√£o Jo√£o Paulo II escreveu uma cartinha sobre o domingo (Dies Domini). Ali ele tenta mostrar a import√¢ncia de se recuperar o Domingo como Dia do Senhor, Dia da Cria√ß√£o, Dia do Ser Humano, Dia do Descanso.
A preocupa√ß√£o do Papa revelava o que estamos vivendo: o domingo perdeu quase por completo seu sentido original que traz no pr√≥prio nome: Dominica, Dies Domini: Dia do Senhor. As mudan√ßas nas rela√ß√µes econ√¥micas, culturais, sociais e religiosas pelas quais tem passado o nosso mundo, trazem consigo esse novo modo de viver o Domingo. Isso n√£o somente entre os agn√≥sticos e arreligiosos, mas tamb√©m entre os pr√≥prios crist√£os e cat√≥licos.
Se por um lado essa esp√©cie de indiferen√ßa diante do domingo e outras celebra√ß√µes lit√∫rgicas ditas ‚Äúde preceito‚Äù trazem certa dificuldade e tristeza, por outro, ajudam a reconsiderar caminhos feitos e fortalecer aqueles que ainda acreditam na for√ßa e import√¢ncia de celebrar o Domingo como dia do Senhor e do descanso.
A ordem de Deus a Mois√©s para que se guardasse o S√°bado era um meio de se fazer mem√≥ria da liberta√ß√£o do Egito operada pelo pr√≥prio Senhor. Tamb√©m traz dentro de si o eterno desejo do Criador: o ser humano n√£o √© escravo; precisa viver em liberdade. Quando o texto sagrado diz que ‚Äúo s√©timo dia √© s√°bado para o Senhor teu Deus‚Äù (Dt 5,14), quer nos lembrar que o ‚ÄúS√°bado‚Äù n√£o √© mera prescri√ß√£o ou observ√¢ncia legal, mas uma exig√™ncia de liberdade e di√°logo entre Deus e seu povo. √â um dia de descanso ‚Äúpara o Senhor‚Äù. N√£o √© preciso dizer que o S√°bado dos judeus se converteu no Domingo para n√≥s crist√£os por causa da Ressurrei√ß√£o do Senhor.
Outra reflex√£o que fazemos a partir do evangelho de hoje √© referente √† transgress√£o das leis e normas. At√© que ponto a Lei deve ser cumprida e desde quando deve ser transgredida?
Nos tempos de Jesus a observ√¢ncia do S√°bado se transformara num peso insuport√°vel. Em vez de ser dia de repouso, de descanso, tornou-se dia de peso, de cansa√ßo. Uma escravid√£o. O culto sab√°tico caiu numa a√ß√£o externa e formal.
Jesus veio dar novo sentido √† Lei, ao S√°bado. Ele n√£o transgride nem suprime a Lei, mas vem dar-lhe pleno sentido (cf. Mt 5,17). Para isso ele parte de dois princ√≠pios: a miseric√≥rdia e a consci√™ncia. Uma realidade divina e outra humana. Apelo do Alto e resposta humana.
No princ√≠pio da Miseric√≥rdia ele parte da realidade do ser humano e suas necessidades imediatas que precisam estar acima de qualquer lei. Uma legisla√ß√£o ou c√≥digo de normas que n√£o leva em conta o ser humano como prioridade √© vazia de sentido. ‚ÄúO s√°bado foi feito para o homem e n√£o o homem para o s√°bado‚Äù (Mc 2,27). A miseric√≥rdia deve prevalecer sobre as exig√™ncias legais. Por isso Jesus cura aquele homem no dia de S√°bado. Quem quiser viver o princ√≠pio da Miseric√≥rdia coloca em risco sua vida √† semelhan√ßa de Jesus: √© uma atitude eucar√≠stica.
Um dado interessante no relato do evangelho de hoje √© que, estando dentro da sinagoga, num momento de culto a Deus, enquanto as aten√ß√µes se voltam para Deus, Jesus volta seu olhar para aquele homem doente. E pede que ele ‚Äúfique no meio‚Äù. Foi, certamente, uma afronta aos dirigentes do culto. Deus n√£o deve ocupar o primeiro e absoluto lugar no culto? Ser√° que Jesus est√° invertendo o sentido da celebra√ß√£o? O que levou Jesus a colocar o homem doente no centro? ‚Äì Jesus n√£o inverte o sentido do culto, mas quer ensinar que um culto que n√£o nos compromete com os irm√£os √© vazio para o Pai. √â como se ele dissesse: ‚ÄúO culto que agrada ao Pai √© aquele que converte o cora√ß√£o do ser humano e o coloca em empatia, em solidariedade, em atitude de miseric√≥rdia para com aqueles que sofrem‚Äù (cf. Is 58,6-7). ‚Äì Convenhamos: h√° atitudes dentro de nossas celebra√ß√µes eivadas de ego√≠smo, vaidade, desprezo, arrog√¢ncia, indiferen√ßa, discrimina√ß√£o... (cf. Tg 2,2-4).
Jesus veio mostrar um novo modo de se relacionar com Deus. O culto que n√£o leva a cuidar do ser humano n√£o chega ao cora√ß√£o do Pai. Podemos afirmar ent√£o que a grande contribui√ß√£o de Jesus em rela√ß√£o √†s outras religi√µes √© a de revelar um Deus que n√£o existe para si mesmo. Deus criou o ser humano para que participasse de sua vida e gl√≥ria. Deus √© amor que se doa, que sai de si, que se interessa pelo ser humano. E sua gl√≥ria consiste em buscar o bem de todas as criaturas.
Portanto, n√£o basta defender a ordem no Pa√≠s, como reza nossa bandeira, se n√£o se busca a defesa e os cuidados dos direitos fundamentais da pessoa humana. O Estado existe para administrar e distribuir equitativamente os bens da Na√ß√£o. Se, em nome da ordem, o Estado prejudica o ser humano, tal ordem n√£o pode ser cumprida. √â um pecado e um crime empenhar-se num progresso que se faz em detrimento da humanidade. O ‚Äúdescartado‚Äù, o ‚Äúinv√°lido‚Äù, o ‚Äúsobrante‚Äù, o ‚Äúinvis√≠vel‚Äù precisa estar ‚Äúno meio‚Äù: para receber visibilidade e cuidado.
O mesmo pode-se dizer em rela√ß√£o √† Igreja. Suas leis devem estar sempre a servi√ßo da humanidade. N√£o podem constituir-se em uma carga pesada que sufoca e oprime. N√£o √© suficiente defender uma disciplina da Igreja por si mesma. Se tal disciplina n√£o ajuda a comunidade a ser mais generosa, mais tolerante, mais misericordiosa, mais inclusiva precisa ser revista, refeita na medida do Evangelho.
A primeira miss√£o da Igreja n√£o √© impor leis morais, mas ajudar o ser humano a descobrir que Deus o ama. Ajud√°-lo a encontrar aquele ponto no qual descobre a bondade e o amor de Deus por ele e pela humanidade toda, manifestado em Jesus de Nazar√©. E lev√°-lo a perceber que ele √© chamado por Deus a colaborar na obra da salva√ß√£o e cuidados da humanidade.
Pe. Aureliano de Moura Lima, SDN
